text: 1001 Nights is a Canadian animated television series developed and produced at Big Bad Boo Studios, based on stories from One Thousand and One Nights. This is the first time the books of One Thousand and One Nights were made into an animated TV series for children. == References == Category:2011 Canadian television series debuts Category:Canadian animated television series Category:Canadian children's television series
title: 1001 Nights (TV series)
